title: Explore the effects of social media on body image among teenagers
description: Explore the effects of social media on body image among teenagers, focusing on the influence of advertising, peer comparison, and the role of parental guidance.

title: Assess the ethical implications and fairness of using AI in hiring processes
description: Assess the ethical implications and fairness of using AI in hiring processes, considering aspects like bias, privacy, and the impact on candidate diversity.

title: Investigate the balance between privacy and public safety in the use of surveillance cameras in urban areas
description: Investigate the balance between privacy and public safety in the use of surveillance cameras in urban areas, considering legal, ethical, and technological perspectives.

title: Evaluate the impact of daily screen time on mental health across different age groups
description: Evaluate the impact of daily screen time on mental health across different age groups, considering factors like duration, content type, and potential benefits or harms.

title: Compare the Keto, Vegan, and Mediterranean diets
description: Compare the Keto, Vegan, and Mediterranean diets focusing on their nutritional profiles, suitability for various age groups, and effects on diabetes and heart health.

title: Evaluate the effectiveness of various digital tools and apps in managing and tracking symptoms of asthma
description: Evaluate the effectiveness of various digital tools and apps in managing and tracking symptoms of asthma, including emergency response features and long-term treatment adherence.

title: Analyze the pros and cons of electric cars vs. gasoline cars
description: Analyze the pros and cons of electric cars vs. gasoline cars in terms of cost, environmental impact, and performance for city and long-distance driving.

title: Investigate and report on the effectiveness of three major home insulation materials
description: Investigate and report on the effectiveness of three major home insulation materials (fiberglass, cellulose, and foam) in terms of energy efficiency, cost, and environmental impact.

title: Evaluate the feasibility and impact of adopting a carbon-neutral lifestyle
description: Evaluate the feasibility and impact of adopting a carbon-neutral lifestyle, focusing on changes in diet, transportation, and energy use at home.
